item.title: Create_blog_github
item.description: 1. Create an account on Github 2. Download Github Desktop 3 Install hugo (macbook air m1) brew install hugo If you need to install brew Open the terminal and run the following command: /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)" And press ENTER Add Homebrew to your PATH: copy that 2 lines in your terminal and press Enter 4. Create a new repository 5. Create a new site Open a terminal, -> Go to desktop and run the following command:

item.title: Obsidian Git
item.description: Step 1. We need a GitHub account. Login into the github account. Create a new repository Create the new repository. Note the git commands Step 2. Download and install git on Windows. Type “download git” on the google search -> Install the git Step 3. Download and install obsidian on Windows. Download obsidian Step 4. Configure obsidian and git. Now, we need to add git plugins Turn on comunity plugins Navigate to the obsidian vault folder
